title: Organization
description: An organization that provides a publication or index

id.description: The unique identifier for this organization

summary.description: A short summary of the subject for the overview page

description.description: An extensive description of the subject for display on the subject page

image.description: An image for the subject, can be provided as a reference `url` or `base64` encoded image

rsin.description: The RSIN of the Non-natural person being the organization that created the case. This must be a valid RSIN consisting of 9 digits and comply with the 11-test as described in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burgerservicenummer#11-proef.
